headline: AI startup Modular raises $250 million, seeks to challenge Nvidia dominance
summary: (Reuters) -AI startup Modular said on Wednesday it raised $250 million in a funding round valuing it at $1.6 billion, as it aims to challenge Nvidia's software stranglehold on the AI computing market.  DFJ Growth and all existing investors, including GV, General Catalyst and Greylock also joined the round.  Founded in 2022 by veteran engineers at Apple and Google, Modular's platform is designed to allow developers to run their AI applications across a variety of computer chips without having to rewrite code for each one.

raw.headline: AI startup Modular raises $250 million, seeks to challenge Nvidia dominance
raw.summary: (Reuters) -AI startup Modular said on Wednesday it raised $250 million in a funding round valuing it at $1.6 billion, as it aims to challenge Nvidia's software stranglehold on the AI computing market.  DFJ Growth and all existing investors, including GV, General Catalyst and Greylock also joined the round.  Founded in 2022 by veteran engineers at Apple and Google, Modular's platform is designed to allow developers to run their AI applications across a variety of computer chips without having to rewrite code for each one.

headline: Stock Market Today: Dow Up After Homes Sales Surprise; Oracle, Open AI Rev Up Stargate Plan (Live Coverage)
summary: The Dow Jones Industrial Average edged higher as other major stock indexes wavered Wednesday, a day after Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell flagged lofty equity levels. Artificial intelligence stock Micron Technology declined on the stock market today after the company's earnings report.

headline: Is an AI bubble forming? We could be pouring gas 'on the fire.'
summary: While more tech giants invest heavily into artificial intelligence — Nvidia's (NVDA) multibillion-dollar investments in Intel (INTC) and OpenAI, Alibaba (BABA) raising its AI spending past $50 billion — is an AI bubble starting to form around markets (^DJI, ^IXIC, ^GSPC)? Asterozoa Capital CIO Joe Hegener sits down with Morning Brief host Julie Hyman to analyze whether a bubble could be forming around equity markets, driven by AI and the Federal Reserve cutting interest rates. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: AMD Expands Cohere Partnership To Power Enterprise AI On Instinct Chips
summary: Advanced Micro Devices (NASDAQ:AMD) expanded its global partnership with enterprise artificial intelligence firm Cohere on Wednesday. Under the new agreement, Cohere will make its full suite of enterprise AI products—including Command A, Command A Vision, Command A Translate, and North—available on AMD’s Instinct graphics processing unit (GPU)-powered infrastructure. The move gives enterprises and sovereign AI initiatives in Canada and worldwide greater flexibility to scale their AI deployments

The move gives enterprises and sovereign AI initiatives in Canada and worldwide greater flexibility to scale their AI deployments

headline: AI Chips Update - Patmos Transforms Kansas City With AI Datacenter Expansion
summary: Patmos has announced a significant expansion of its AI datacenter facility in downtown Kansas City, introducing 10MW of new colocation space dedicated to high-density GPU, HPC, and AI infrastructure. This expansion marks the transformation of an old industrial site, previously housing The KC Star newspaper's printing press, into a cutting-edge data center as part of Patmos' new AI Campus. The development is a response to the surging demand for AI infrastructure in the U.S., leveraging Kansas...

headline: Are AMD Shares Still Worth the Price After Fresh China Trade Probe?
summary: If you have Advanced Micro Devices (AMD) on your watchlist and are wondering what to do next, you are definitely not alone. AMD’s stock has become a battleground for both optimists and skeptics, with volatility swirling around global headlines and sector news. Over the past week, shares have remained almost flat, nudging up by 0.3%. Yet step back a bit and you'll see that in the last month, AMD slipped 4.1%, even as its year-to-date gain is an impressive 33.4%. Zoom out further to review the...
